person.persName: Stephen G Averitt (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Born in 1843 in Kentucky. Married to Mary Averett. Children included Mary Roper. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on July 27, 1861. Promoted from 1st Sergeant, April 10, 1864.
